name: image_classification
desc: Classify images into predefined categories using a deep learning model. Suitable for object recognition, scene understanding, and content moderation tasks.

name: text_summarization
desc: Generate concise summaries of long text documents while preserving key information. Useful for document processing and information extraction.

name: image_captioning
desc: Generate descriptive captions for images using a combination of computer vision and natural language processing techniques.

name: object_detection
desc: Detect and localize multiple objects in images with bounding boxes. Supports real-time detection of common objects, people, and vehicles.

name: machine_translation
desc: Translate text between different languages using neural machine translation models. Supports 50+ language pairs.

name: super_resolution
desc: Enhance the resolution of low-quality images using deep learning techniques. Ideal for improving image clarity in photography and surveillance.

name: visual_question_answering
desc: Answer questions about the content of images by combining visual and textual information.
